enemies_12000_bc.name: Bantam Imp
enemies_12000_bc.notes_and_attacks: May transform into a Stone Imp after being attacked, Physical/Magic damage to 1 character, Magic damage and causes HP to steadily drop to 1 character

enemies_12000_bc.name: Barghest
enemies_12000_bc.notes_and_attacks: Appears with Jinn, Physical damage to 1 character (if Jinn is alive), Shadow damage to all characters (if Jinn is dead), Counterattacks with magic damage to all characters (if its near Jinn when its hit)

enemies_12000_bc.name: Basher
enemies_12000_bc.notes_and_attacks: Physical/Magic damage to 1 character

enemies_12000_bc.name: Beast
enemies_12000_bc.notes_and_attacks: Physical/Magic damage to 1 character only if it is close to that character, Physical/Magic damage to 1 character, Attack power increases when it is damaged

enemies_12000_bc.name: Blue Beast
enemies_12000_bc.notes_and_attacks: Appears with Red Beast and Mud Imp, Dies when Mud Imp dies

enemies_12000_bc.name: Blue Scout
enemies_12000_bc.notes_and_attacks: Water damage to 1 character, Counterattacks against fire, lightning, shadow, and generic magic damage with water damage to all characters

enemies_12000_bc.name: Byte
enemies_12000_bc.notes_and_attacks: Physical damage to 1 character

enemies_12000_bc.name: Dalton
enemies_12000_bc.notes_and_attacks: Magic damage to all characters at death, Reduces the HP of 1 character to 1/2, Counterattacks by reducing the HP of 1 character to 1/2

enemies_12000_bc.name: Dalton Plus
enemies_12000_bc.notes_and_attacks: Physical damage to 1 character, Physical damage to 1 character, Magic damage to 1 character, Counterattacks against magic damage with damage of the opposite element on all characters, Counterattacks against physical damage by reducing the HP of 1 character by 1/2

enemies_12000_bc.name: Gargoyle
enemies_12000_bc.notes_and_attacks: Reduces 1 character's HP to 1, Physical/Magic damage to 1 character, Physical/Magic damge to 1 character

enemies_12000_bc.name: Giga Gaia
enemies_12000_bc.notes_and_attacks: Appears with Giga Gaia (Left Hand) and Giga Gaia (Right Hand), Shadow damage to all characters (only if both hands are alive), Fire damage to all characters (only if both hands are alive), Revives a hand or both hands for 1/2 their maximum HP (only if 1 or both hands are defeated), Fire damage to all characters (only if left hand is destroyed, but right hand is alive)

enemies_12000_bc.name: Giga Gaia (Right Hand)
enemies_12000_bc.notes_and_attacks: Appears with Giga Gaia and Giga Gaia (Left hand), Cuts HP of 1 character in half only if Left hand is destroyed, Dies when Giga Gaia dies

enemies_12000_bc.name: Giga Gaia (Left Hand)
enemies_12000_bc.notes_and_attacks: Appears with Giga Gaia and Giga Gaia (Right Hand), Heals Giga Gaia, Water damage to 1 character only if Giga Gaia (Right Hand) is destroyed, Dies when Giga Gaia dies

enemies_12000_bc.name: Golem
enemies_12000_bc.notes_and_attacks: Magic damage to all characters as it dies. Its attacks vary depending on what you attack it with. If you attack it with physical attacks it does physical damage to 1 character or reduces the HP of 1 character by half (it also starts out with those attacks). If you attack it with fire it does fire damage to all characters or does fire damage to 1 character. If you attack it with lightning damage it does lightning damage to all characters. If you attack it with water damage it does water damage to all characters or does water damage to 1 character. If you attack it with shadow damage it does shadow (but not magic) damage to all characters.

enemies_12000_bc.name: Golem Boss
enemies_12000_bc.notes_and_attacks: Runs Away

enemies_12000_bc.name: Jinn
enemies_12000_bc.notes_and_attacks: Appears with Barghest, High magic defense, High defense until you kill Barghest and damage him once, Sacrifices itself to heal Barghest

enemies_12000_bc.name: Lasher
enemies_12000_bc.notes_and_attacks: NOTES AND ATTACKS

enemies_12000_bc.name: Lavos
enemies_12000_bc.notes_and_attacks: Must lose to advance plot, Physical damage on all characters, Magic damage and confuse to all characters, Physical damage on 1 character

enemies_12000_bc.name: Mage
enemies_12000_bc.notes_and_attacks: Physical damage to 1 character, Physical/Magic damage to 1 character, Locks 1 character

enemies_12000_bc.name: Magus
enemies_12000_bc.notes_and_attacks: Magic/Physical damage to 1 character, Fire damage to all characters, Lightning damage to all characters, Water damage to all characters

enemies_12000_bc.name: Man-Eater
enemies_12000_bc.notes_and_attacks: Physical damage and confuse to 1 character, Heals all comrades

enemies_12000_bc.name: Mud Imp
enemies_12000_bc.notes_and_attacks: Appears with the Blue Beast and Red Beast, Damages one beast (if one beast is still alive) which sometimes makes the beast do magic/physical damage to 1 character, Physical damage to 1 character (if at least one beast is still alive), Heals all allies, Makes one character fall asleep and does magic damage, Counterattacks with physical damage to 1 character (half the time and only if both beasts are still alive), Counterattacks with damage to all characters (the other half the time and only if both beasts are still alive), Counterattacks by healing all allies (if both beasts are not still alive), Defense lowers when both Beasts die, May run when both Beasts are dead

enemies_12000_bc.name: Nu (1)
enemies_12000_bc.notes_and_attacks: 3 of these appear with 3 Nu (2)s, Reduces 1 character's HP to 1

enemies_12000_bc.name: Nu (2)
enemies_12000_bc.notes_and_attacks: 3 of these appear with 3 Nu (1)s, Reduces 1 character's HP by 1

enemies_12000_bc.name: Red Beast
enemies_12000_bc.notes_and_attacks: Appears with Blue Beast and Mud Imp, Dies when Mud Imp dies

enemies_12000_bc.name: Red Scout
enemies_12000_bc.notes_and_attacks: Magic damage to 1 character and lowers HP steadily, Counterattacks against lightning, water, and generic magic damage with fire damage to all characters

enemies_12000_bc.name: Rubble
enemies_12000_bc.notes_and_attacks: Locks all characters at beginning of fight, Runs away

enemies_12000_bc.name: Scouter
enemies_12000_bc.notes_and_attacks: Puts 1 character to sleep, Lightning damage to 1 character, Counterattacks with shadow damage to all characters if a Blue Scout and Red Scout are still alive, Counterattacks against fire, water, shadow, and generic magic damage with lightning damage to all characters if a Blue Scout and Red Scout are not still alive

enemies_12000_bc.name: Stone Imp
enemies_12000_bc.notes_and_attacks: Physical/Magic damage to 1 character, Magic damage to 1 character

enemies_12000_bc.name: Thrasher
enemies_12000_bc.notes_and_attacks: Physical/Magic damage to 1 character, Counterattacks with physical damage and chaos to all characters only if there is one other Thrasher still alive

enemies_12000_bc.name: Turret
enemies_12000_bc.notes_and_attacks: Locks all characters at the beginning of the fight, Shadow damage to 1 character, Self destructs
